original_description: You woke up in a strange vault. Meet its residents before they decide to throw your ass back out.
Thicc Tina offers Grace and her rich dad's location in exchange for sparing her gang.
Vault psychologist insists you take a "harmless" test. She's way too into it.
Blast sick beats for the Way of the Shaft—turn on the Mega Speaker and shake the Wasteland.
You took out the Brotherhood outcast—let Baron Voss know the deed is done.
Candy needs help killing ball-sucking bugs that took the Vault under siege.
Baron Voss wants a rogue Brotherhood preacher dead—his cult is too close to his walls.
Diana needs classy lingerie — definitely not Vault-issued. Check the vault's black market!
Diana's losing it—get her a monster dildo, rumored to be somewhere out in the wasteland.
Appease Sir Whiskers, Diana's cat, by offering him his royal tribute: tuna.
Help the Resistence Leader overthrow the Overseer's anti-fap regime.
Help the Resistence Leader overthrow the Overseer's anti-fap regime.
Help the Resistence Leader overthrow the Overseer's anti-fap regime.
Help the Resistence Leader overthrow the Overseer's anti-fap regime.
Help the Resistence Leader overthrow the Overseer's anti-fap regime.
Restore the Vault's sexbot original programming to serve the Resistance.
Help the Purity Police by bonking 10 rulebreakers around the vault.
You fucked Buster's crush right in front of him. Let's see what he thinks.
Gina asked you to retrieve a confiscated recipe book from the Purity Police.
Gina asked you to help her clean the Diner.
Gina asked you to grow special cucumbers for her *special* salad.

original_title: Get a vault suit for Grace.
original_description: Grace's still wandering hallways naked. Get her a vault suit.
Escort Grace, a brothel-held baron’s daughter, back to her wealthy father.
One of the residents asked for a gun to gain power in the vault. Seems like he has big plans.
Overseer’s daughter needs Deathclaw ball juice for a 'love potion' she's working on.
Overseer Blue Balls sends you to stop Mistress Domina's reign of terror.
Scarlett said the Overseer has a "very important" job for you. You might want to talk to him.
Steal Diana's panties for Hugh Jass, the vault’s most famous fapper.
Todd Howard demands you undo your cursed choices. Chant his mantra.
Sammy's sister asked you to get them clean water to treat Sammy's wound.
Enclave has issued a bounty on local mutants. Deliver 5 heads to them for a reward.

original_title: Bring a Brahmin to Children of Atom
original_description: Mother Virela asked you to bring them a Brahmin for sacrifice.

original_title: Get the Keys from Mr. Greaves
original_description: A ghoul slave asked you to get the keys from its owner so they can escape.
Farmer Merle asked you to rescue his wife, taken by the Brotherhood after they refused to pay tribute.
A farmer’s daughter, June, lost her clothes again. Help her find them.
Hans has given you a password to enter the Encalve Citadel.
The freed ghoul revealed the location of a hidden vault buried beneath a silo.

original_title: Escort Overseer's Daughter to Deathroot Bog
original_description: The Overseer's daughter wants to test her potion. Escort her to the Deathroot Bog.
Diana craves some fish, and with none in the vault, you must brave the wasteland to reel one in.
Diana is pregnant with your child, but the Purity Police have deemed her a threat. Convince them to let her stay, or she’ll be exiled.
